content: classic breton stripes and the fluffiest of yarns work together beautifully in this variation on our beloved sampler shawl pattern pick two colors go classic or go wild and make your own version to wear out as the seasons transition samples shown mc big birdie in color classic cc big birdie in color vintage and mc big birdie in color pop rocks cc big birdie in color miel sizes one size finished measurements approx 58 wingspan x 30 deep along center spine yarn requirements *please note these are yarn estimates the amount used will depend on yarn your personal gauge and any modifications you make * dimond laine big birdie 79% alpaca 21% silk 174 yards per 100g 3 skeins total 2 skeins in mc and 1 skein in cc or aran weight yarn in the following amounts mc 330 yds/ 300 m cc 50 yds / 45 m suggested needles *needles listed are suggested * gauge needle us 10 5 6 0mm 32 circular needles or longer tools 4 markers darning needle gauge *while gauge is not crucial it will affect overall yardage used and the overall finished dimensions * 11 sts and 18 row=4 in stockinette st using gauge needle blocked
